events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, including their resume and cover letter highlighting relevant development experience.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's background in software development and experience with backend systems.
A recruiter specialized in technical hiring has been assigned to manage this application and will contact the candidate for the next steps.
The initial phone screening was successfully completed; the candidate showed strong knowledge in software engineering principles and aligns well with our team's requirements.
The candidate promptly responded to the interview invitation confirming their availability and enthusiasm for the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10 AM to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities in real-time.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance, demonstrating clear understanding of algorithms and system design.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and benefits, set for May 7th at 2 PM.
The HR interview was positive; the candidate expressed strong enthusiasm for joining the engineering team and shared relevant soft skills.
An official job offer was sent to the candidate, including details on salary, benefits, and start date for the software engineer position.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join the company pending final agreement.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date. The hiring process is now moving towards onboarding.
The candidate has started the onboarding process, completing initial paperwork and attending orientation sessions to join the engineering team.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully, with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the software engineering department.
